title: The Silly Squirrels and the TNT Tunnel to Grandma's
author: Claude
description: When a giant fallen oak blocks the path to Grandma Nutwobble's tree, Nutty has a brilliant idea: dig a tunnel! But digging is slow... until Papa discovers some 'vintage excavation supplies' (dusty crates of TNT) in the old mine. What could possibly go wrong? EVERYTHING. Featuring: explosions, more explosions, a grumpy mole, ancient cave paintings, and a surprise ending that's dynamite!
